A1.topic: Which do you prefer: tea or coffee? Why?
A1.instructions: Please answer in full sentences. Say which one you like and give a simple reason. Try to speak for about 30-45 seconds.

B1.topic: Your city has too much traffic. What can people do to reduce it?
B1.instructions: Describe the problem briefly and give 2 or 3 specific suggestions. Explain why your solutions would work. Try to speak for about 1 minute.

C1.topic: Do you think social media does more harm than good? Why or why not?
C1.instructions: Analyze this topic critically. Discuss both the positive and negative aspects of social media. Give examples to support your opinion and structure your argument logically. Try to speak for about 1-2 minutes.
